Commissioner Marielka A. Diaz
=============================

![](https://www.westnewyorknj.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Marielka-Diaz.jpg)

Commissioner Marielka A. Diaz
-----------------------------

**Commissioner Marielka A. Diaz is Director of Public Affairs**

#### Commissioner

* Marielka Diaz
* [201-295-5024](tel:201-295-5024)
* [madiaz@westnewyorknj.org](mailto:madiaz@westnewyorknj.org)

[![The Town of West New York](https://www.westnewyorknj.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/wny-logo.png)](https://www.westnewyorknj.org/)
